roleset.name: to strengthen
roleset.note: REINFORCE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'reinforce' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from reinforce.01-v predicate notes)
REINFORCEMENT-N NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Comparison to reinforce.01. No VN class. Framed by Katie. (from reinforcement.01-n)

example.name: with instrument
example.text: Although the polyester and rayon markets remain mostly bleak , Akzo has high hopes for some emerging fiber businesses , such carbon fibers and aramid , [extremely strong fibers]-1 used [*]-1 [*-1] to reinforce tires and metals and to make such products as bullet-proof vests .

example.name: inanimate causer
example.text: Graham Beale , manager of foreign-exchange operations at Hong Kong& Shanghai Banking Corp. in New York , added that Mrs. Thatcher 's comments reinforced the market 's growing confidence about sterling and compounded the unit 's later decline .
example.arg: the market 's growing confidence about sterling

example.name: unspecified subject
example.text: `` The only response to the challenge being presented [*] to us by the East , '' Mr. Mitterrand told [*T*-1]the European Parliament in Strasbourg yesterday , `` is [*] to reinforce and accelerate the union and cohesion of the European Community . ''
example.arg: the union and cohesion of the European Community

example.name: args 0 and 1
example.text: Reinforcement of instructions by Dr. Sfdskl.
